data.eml:eml: The first species of the genus Caponina from Brazilian Amazonia (Araneae: Caponiidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Brescovit, Antonio D., Ruiz, Alexander Sánchez (2013): The first species of the genus Caponina from Brazilian Amazonia (Araneae: Caponiidae). Zootaxa 3640 (2): 296-298, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3640.2.11
